Articles.Content:
I hope there will be options to assign more than one key to same action.

And there is no way to clear of keybind to empty

And a lot of key binding are static

  • Accelerate / Decelerate ground vehicle
  • Move Left / Right a ground vehicle
  • Exit map view
  • Grab ladder
  • Board ship

(guess there are more I didn't thought about / discovered)
Even impossible to remap via direct editing of InputBindings.json
